Sentece: We identified several compounds with MICs ≤25 μM against M. pulmonis (n = 5), M. capricolum (n = 4), M. gallisepticum (n = 3), M. alligatoris (n = 3), M. agassizii (n = 2), and M. canis (n = 1).
Title: Efficacy data of halogenated phenazine and quinoline agents and an NH125 analogue to veterinary mycoplasmas.
Name: Nitroxoline

Sentece: An N-arylated NH125 analogue, compound 21, served as the most efficacious, having a MIC ≤25 μM against all mycoplasmas tested, followed by two quinolines, nitroxoline (compound 12) and compound 20, which were effective against four and three mycoplasma type strains, respectively.
Title: Efficacy data of halogenated phenazine and quinoline agents and an NH125 analogue to veterinary mycoplasmas.
Name: Nitroxoline

Sentece: 2) Despite individual variations due to oral administration, pharmacokinetic parameters could be calculated: Tmax: 1.75 +/- 1.04 h; Cmax: 5.59 +/- 3.15 mg/l; t 1/2 beta: 2.63 +/- 2.66 h.
Title: [Present status of nitroxoline].
Name: Nitroxoline
